channel.title: CVE Feed for Howard Ehrenberg -- Custom Post Carousels with Owl
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Howard Ehrenberg -- Custom Post Carousels with Owl

item.title: CVE-2023-51493|2024-06-27T20:43:17.842Z -- howard%20ehrenberg -- custom%20post%20carousels%20with%20owl
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Howard Ehrenberg Custom Post Carousels with Owl allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Custom Post Carousels with Owl: from n/a through 1.4.6.
